block.description: The namespace and ID of the block to place.
block.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the block to place.

type.description:
## Set Block --- [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/set_block) Overwrites the block at the targeted position with the default state of another one. Type ID: `origins:set_block` --- ### Examples ```json "block_action": { "type": "origins:set_block", "block": "minecraft:coal_ore" } ``` This example will set a Coal Ore block at the position of the block action type.
```json "block_action": { "type": "origins:set_block", "block": "minecraft:redstone_lamp[lit=true]" } ``` This example will set a Lit Redstone Lamp at the position of the block action type.
type.markdownDescription:
undefined## Set Block --- [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/set_block) Overwrites the block at the targeted position with the default state of another one. Type ID: `origins:set_block` --- ### Examples ```json "block_action": { "type": "origins:set_block", "block": "minecraft:coal_ore" } ``` This example will set a Coal Ore block at the position of the block action type.
```json "block_action": { "type": "origins:set_block", "block": "minecraft:redstone_lamp[lit=true]" } ``` This example will set a Lit Redstone Lamp at the position of the block action type.
